short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveal what people really are thinking when they're sending those thougths and prayers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of just seeing the same "Thoughts and Prayers" platitudes?  Here's a handy little extension that you can install to use with Google Chrome that cuts through the platitudes to look at what people are really thinking.

Pulled from this great little tutorial here: https://9to5google.com/2015/06/14/how-to-make-a-chrome-extensions/
